TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DiscoveryClientProtocol extends System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpWebClientProtocol

summary.span: 为以编程方式调用 XML Web services 发现提供支持。

span.span: Provides support for programmatically invoking XML Web services discovery.

remarks.format: ## Remarks XML Web service 发现是查找或发现一个或多个描述可用 XML Web 服务的相关文档的过程。XML Web service discovery is the process of locating, or discovering, one or more related documents that describe available XML Web services. 它通过 XML Web services 发现，XML Web service 客户端了解给定 URL 处可用的 XML Web services 以及如何使用它们。It is through XML Web services discovery that XML Web service clients learn about the available XML Web services at a given URL and how to use them. XML Web services 发现的工作原理是：您已通过目录服务（如）获取了对发现文档的 URL， http://uddi.microsoft.com 但您没有提供的 XML Web services 的详细信息。XML Web services discovery works from the premise that you have already obtained the URL to a discovery document, possibly through a directory service, such as http://uddi.microsoft.com, however, you do not have the details about the XML Web services offered. 通过 XML Web services 发现，可以发现有关特定 URL 内的中所列的 XML Web services 的详细信息 。Through XML Web services discovery, you can discover the details about the XML Web services listed in a at a specific URL. XML Web service 客户端通过提供或方法的 URL 来启动 XML Web services 发现 。An XML Web service client starts XML Web services discovery by supplying a URL to either the or methods. 通常，此 URL 引用发现文档，该文档又指描述一个或多个 XML Web services 的文档，这些文档已添加到属性中 。Typically, this URL refers to a discovery document, which in turn refers to documents that describe one or more XML Web services, which are added to the property. 此时，只会下载并验证该文档，以指向有关 XML Web services 的有效信息。At that point, only that document is downloaded and verified to point to valid information about XML Web services. 但是，在此阶段不验证包含在该文档中的引用。However, the references contained in that document are not verified at this stage. 相反，它们会添加到 属性中。Instead they are added to the property. 若要验证引用是否有效，请调用 或 方法，这将向属性添加有效的引用文档 。To verify that the references are valid, invoke the or methods, which add valid referenced documents to the property. 最后，如果客户端要将发现结果保存到磁盘，请调用 方法。Last, if a client wants to save the discovery results to disk, invoke the method. 如果不需要以编程方式访问 XML Web services 发现，Windows SDK 会提供 Web 服务发现工具 ( # A0) 用于在命令提示符下发现 XML Web services。If programmatic access to XML Web services discovery is not needed, the Windows SDK ships the Web Services Discovery tool (Disco.exe) for discovering XML Web services within a command prompt. 有关更多详细信息，请参阅 [Web 服务发现工具 ( # A0) ](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/acd88078-c581-42bc-94ca-6633e2851979)。For more details, see [Web Services Discovery Tool (Disco.exe)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/acd88078-c581-42bc-94ca-6633e2851979). ## Examples 下面的代码示例是一个 Web 窗体，演示如何 结合使用类和命名空间中的其他类 ，以编程方式调用 XML Web services 发现。The following code example is a Web Form demonstrating how to use the class together with the other classes in the namespace to programmatically invoke XML Web services discovery. 此代码示例演示如何使用 、 、 、 、 和 方法。The code example demonstrates using the , , , , , and methods. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[DiscoveryClientProtocol#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DiscoveryClientProtocol/CS/discocs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DiscoveryClientProtocol#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DiscoveryClientProtocol/VB/discovb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取除在发现文档中找到的引用以外的信息。

span.span: Gets information in addition to references found in the discovery document.

value.span: ，它包含在发现文档中找到的附加信息。

span.span: An containing additional information found in the discovery document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性主要包含 在发现文档中定义的类所表示的 SOAP 绑定。The property primarily contains SOAP bindings, represented by the class, defined in the discovery document. ## Examples [!code-cpp[DiscoveryClientProtocol_AdditionalInformation#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DiscoveryClientProtocol_AdditionalInformation/CPP/discoveryclientprotocol_additionalinformation.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[DiscoveryClientProtocol_AdditionalInformation#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DiscoveryClientProtocol_AdditionalInformation/CS/discoveryclientprotocol_additionalinformation.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DiscoveryClientProtocol_AdditionalInformation#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DiscoveryClientProtocol_AdditionalInformation/VB/discoveryclientprotocol_additionalinformation.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument Discover(string url) cil managed
Public Function Discover (url As String) As DiscoveryDocument

param.name: url
param.span: XML Web services 发现开始位置的 URL。

span.span: The URL where XML Web services discovery begins.

summary.span: 发现提供的 URL 以确定它是否为发现文档。

span.span: Discovers the supplied URL to determine if it is a discovery document.

returns.span: ，它包含所提供 URL 处的 XML Web services 发现的结果。

span.span: A containing the results of XML Web services discovery at the supplied URL.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法要求提供的 URL 是发现文档。The method expects that the supplied URL is a discovery document. 如果 URL 引用服务说明或 XML 架构，则会引发异常。If the URL refers to a service description or an XML schema an exception is thrown. 若要发现 XML 架构或服务说明，请调用 方法。To discover an XML schema or a service description invoke the method. 如果提供的 URL 指向有效的发现文档，则提供的 URL 处的发现文档将添加到 和 集合中。If the supplied URL points to a valid discovery document, the discovery document at the supplied URL is added to the and collection. 此外，发现文档中的引用将添加到 集合，但不会被验证为指向有效的发现文档。Additionally, references within the discovery document are added to the collection, but not verified to point to valid discovery documents. 若要验证引用，请指向有效的发现文档以调用 或 方法。To verify the references, point to valid discovery documents to invoke the or methods. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是一个 Web 窗体，其中填充了 有关属性中的文档的详细信息，以及 XML Web services 发现期间每个文档中的引用。The following code example is a Web Form that populates a with the details about the documents in the property together with the references found in each document during XML Web services discovery. `PopulateGrid`方法 使用调用的结果填充， 然后调用 。The `PopulateGrid` method fills the with the results from a invocation followed by a call to . [!code-csharp[DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover/CS/discocs.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover/VB/discovb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 访问所提供的 URL 返回了一个 HTTP 状态代码而不是 。

span.span: Accessing the supplied URL returned an HTTP status code other than .

exception.span: 参数是有效的 URL，但未指向有效的发现文档。

span.span: The parameter is a valid URL, but does not point to a valid discovery document.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument DiscoverAny(string url) cil managed
Public Function DiscoverAny (url As String) As DiscoveryDocument

param.name: url
param.span: XML Web services 发现开始位置的 URL。

span.span: The URL where XML Web services discovery begins.

summary.span: 发现提供的 URL 以确定它是否是发现文档、服务说明或 XML 架构定义 (XSD) 架构。

span.span: Discovers the supplied URL to determine if it is a discovery document, service description or an XML Schema Definition (XSD) schema.

returns.span: ，它包含所提供 URL 处的 XML Web services 发现的结果。

span.span: A containing the results of XML Web services discovery at the supplied URL.

returns.span: 如果 参数引用服务说明或 XSD 架构，则在内存中为它创建 。

span.span: If the parameter refers to a service description or an XSD Schema, a is created in memory for it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法发现所提供的 URL 是否为发现文档、服务说明或 XSD 架构。The method discovers whether the supplied URL is a discovery document, service description or XSD schema. 如果已知 URL 只引用发现文档，则 可能会调用方法。If it is known that the URL only refers to a discovery document, the method might be invoked. 如果提供的 URL 指向有效的发现文档、XSD 架构或服务说明，则提供的 URL 处的发现文档将添加到 和集合中 。If the supplied URL points to a valid discovery document, XSD schema, or service description, the discovery document at the supplied URL is added to the and collections. 当提供的 URL 引用 XSD 架构或服务说明时， 将在内存中创建，并将其添加到 和 集合。When the supplied URL refers to an XSD schema or Service Description a is created in memory and added to the and collections. 此外，发现文档中的引用将添加到 集合，但不会被验证为指向有效的发现文档。Additionally, references within the discovery document are added to the collection, but not verified to point to valid discovery documents. 若要验证引用是否指向有效的发现文档，请调用 或 方法。To verify that references point to valid discovery documents, invoke the or methods. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是一个 Web 窗体，其中填充了 有关属性中的文档的详细信息，以及 XML Web services 发现过程中在每个文档中找到的引用。The following code example is a Web Form that populates a with the details about the documents in the property together with the references found in each document during an XML Web services discovery. `PopulateGrid`方法 使用调用的结果填充， 然后调用 。The `PopulateGrid` method fills the with the results from a invocation followed by a call to . [!code-csharp[DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny/CS/discocs.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny/VB/discovb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Accessing the supplied URL returned an HTTP status code other than .

exception.span: 参数是有效的 URL，但未指向有效的发现文档、服务说明或 XSD 架构。

span.span: The parameter is a valid URL, but does not point to a valid discovery document, service description, or XSD schema.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 调用 、 和方法的过程中，将填充集合 。The collection is populated during invocations to the , , and methods. 在调用 和方法时 ，如果提供的 URL 是有效的发现文档，则会将该文档添加到 集合中。During invocations to the and methods, if the supplied URL is a valid discovery document, that document is added to the collection. 在调用和方法的过程中 ，集合中的有效发现文档引用 将添加到 集合中。During invocations to the and methods, valid discovery document references in the collection are added to the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是一个 Web 窗体，该窗体 使用有关在 XML Web services 发现过程中发现的属性中的文档的详细信息填充。The following code example is a Web Form that populates a with the details about the documents in the property discovered during XML Web services discovery. `PopulateGrid`方法 使用调用的结果填充， 然后调用 。The `PopulateGrid` method fills the with the results from a invocation followed by a call to . > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientResultCollection ReadAll(string topLevelFilename) cil managed
Public Function ReadAll (topLevelFilename As String) As DiscoveryClientResultCollection

param.name: topLevelFilename
param.span: 要读入的文件的名称，该文件包含已保存发现文档的映射。

span.span: Name of file to read in, containing the map of saved discovery documents.

summary.span: 读入包含已保存的发现文档的映射的文件，并使用该文件中引用的发现文档、XML 架构定义 (XSD) 架构和服务说明填充 和 属性。

span.span: Reads in a file containing a map of saved discovery documents populating the and properties, with discovery documents, XML Schema Definition (XSD) schemas, and service descriptions referenced in the file.

returns.span: ，它包含在具有已保存发现文档的映射的文件中找到的结果。

span.span: A containing the results found in the file with the map of saved discovery documents.

returns.span: 文件格式是已序列化为 XML 的 类；然而，通常只使用 方法或 Disco.exe 创建该文件。

span.span: The file format is a class serialized into XML; however, one would typically create the file using only the method or Disco.exe.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含已保存发现文档的映射的文件可以通过 方法或 Disco.exe 创建。A file containing a map of saved discovery documents can be created by the method or Disco.exe. `topLevelFilename`如果文件在当前目录中不存在，则该参数必须包含完全限定的路径。The `topLevelFilename` parameter must include the fully qualified path if the file does not exist in the current directory. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是一个 Web 窗体，它 使用方法在现有发现映射文档中填充包含文档和引用的详细信息 。The following code example is a Web Form that populates a with the details about the documents and references found in an existing discovery map document using the method. MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property References As DiscoveryClientReferenceCollection

summary.span: 在已解析的发现文档中找到的引用的集合。

span.span: A collection of references founds in resolved discovery documents.
A of references discovered.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 调用 、 和方法的过程中，将填充集合 。The collection is populated during invocations to the , , and methods. 在调用 和方法时 ，如果提供的 URL 是有效的发现文档，则会将该文档 与发现文档中找到的引用一起添加到集合中。During invocations to the and methods, if the supplied URL is a valid discovery document, that document is added to the collection together with references found in the discovery document. 在调用期间添加到 和方法的引用并 不一定是有效的发现文档。References added during invocations to the and methods are not necessarily valid discovery documents. 在的调用期间 ， 会将集合中的引用 验证为有效的发现文档。During invocations to and references within the collection are verified as being valid discovery documents. 如果它们有效并且包含引用，则它们也会添加到 集合中。If they are valid and contain references, they are also added to the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是一个 Web 窗体，它 使用有关 XML Web services 发现过程中发现的属性中的引用的详细信息填充。The following code example is a Web Form that populates a with the details about the references in the property discovered during an XML Web services discovery. `PopulateGrid`方法 使用在对的调用中发现的引用填充 。The `PopulateGrid` method fills the with the references found in an invocation to . > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[DiscoveryClientProtocol.References#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DiscoveryClientProtocol.References/CS/discocs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DiscoveryClientProtocol.References#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DiscoveryClientProtocol.References/VB/discovb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ResolveAll() cil managed

summary.span: 解析所有对 属性中的发现文档、XML 架构定义 (XSD) 架构和服务说明的引用以及在引用的发现文档中找到的引用。

span.span: Resolves all references to discovery documents, XML Schema Definition (XSD) schemas, and service descriptions in the property, as well as references found in referenced discovery documents.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 解析它找到的所有有效引用并将其放在 属性中。 resolves all valid references it finds and places them in the property. 和均 可下载并验证属性中的 XSD 架构和服务说明 。Both and download and verify XSD schemas and service descriptions in the property. 但是，这两种方法在处理发现文档的方式上有所不同。However, the two methods differ in how they handle discovery documents. 解析属性内发现文档中的所有引用 ; 如果发现文档包含对其他发现文档的引用，则 只解析这些发现文档。 resolves all references in discovery documents within the property; if a discovery document contains references to other discovery documents, resolves just those discovery documents. 在这些发现文档中找到的发现文档不会通过解析，而是由解析， 而是 全部解决。Discovery documents found in those discovery documents nested one level deep are not resolved by ; whereas resolves them all. 继续解析嵌套的发现文档中的引用，直到没有其他引用。 continues to resolve references in nested discovery documents until there are no more references. 在执行的验证过程中出现的错误 不会在发生时引发，而是收集并添加到属性中 。Errors occurring during the verification process done by are not thrown at the time of occurrence, but rather collected and added to the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是一个 Web 窗体，其中填充了 有关属性中的文档的详细信息，以及 XML Web services 发现过程中在每个文档中找到的引用。The following code example is a Web Form that populates a with the details about the documents in the property together with the references found in each document during an XML Web services discovery. `PopulateGrid`方法 使用调用的结果填充， 然后调用 。The `PopulateGrid` method fills the with the results from a invocation followed by a call to . [!code-csharp[DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll/CS/discocs.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll/VB/discovb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ResolveOneLevel() cil managed

summary.span: 解析 中所有对发现文档、XML 架构定义 (XSD) 架构以及服务说明的引用以及在那些发现文档中找到的引用。

span.span: Resolves all references to discovery documents, XML Schema Definition (XSD) schemas and service descriptions in , as well as references found in those discovery documents.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 解析它找到的所有有效引用并将其放在 属性中。 resolves all valid references it finds and places them in the property. 和均 可下载并验证属性中的 XSD 架构和服务说明 。Both and download and verify XSD schemas and service descriptions in the property. 但是，这两种方法在处理发现文档的方式上有所不同。However, the two methods differ in how they handle discovery documents. 解析属性内发现文档中的所有引用 。 resolves all references in discovery documents within the property. 如果发现文档包含对其他发现文档的引用，则 只解析这些发现文档。If a discovery document contains references to other discovery documents, resolves just those discovery documents. 在这些发现文档中找到的发现文档不会通过解析，而是由解析， 而是 解决所有问题。Discovery documents found in those discovery documents nested one level deep are not resolved by ; whereas resolve them all. 继续解析嵌套的发现文档中的引用，直到没有其他引用。 continues to resolve references in nested discovery documents until there are no more references. 在执行的验证过程中出现的错误 不会在发生时引发，而是收集并添加到属性中 。Errors occurring during the verification process done by are not thrown at the time of occurrence, but rather collected and added to the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是一个 Web 窗体，其中填充了 有关属性中的文档的详细信息，以及 XML Web services 发现过程中在每个文档中找到的引用。The following code example is a Web Form that populates a with the details about the documents in the property together with the references found in each document during an XML Web services discovery. `PopulateGrid`方法 使用调用的结果填充， 然后调用 。The `PopulateGrid` method fills the with the results from a invocation followed by a call to . [!code-csharp[DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel/CS/discocs.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel/VB/discovb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientResultCollection WriteAll(string directory, string topLevelFilename) cil managed
Public Function WriteAll (directory As String, topLevelFilename As String) As DiscoveryClientResultCollection

param.name: directory
param.span: 要将 属性中的当前所有文档保存到其中的目录。

span.span: The directory in which to save all documents currently in the property.

param.name: topLevelFilename
param.span: 要创建或覆盖的文件的名称，该文件包含所有已保存的文档的映射。

span.span: The name of the file to create or overwrite containing a map of all documents saved.

summary.span: 将 属性中的所有发现文档、XML 架构定义 (XSD) 架构和服务说明写入提供的目录并在此目录中创建一个文件。

span.span: Writes all discovery documents, XML Schema Definition (XSD) schemas, and Service Descriptions in the property to the supplied directory and creates a file in that directory.

returns.span: 包含所有已保存文件的结果的 。

span.span: A containing the results of all files saved.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 `topLevelFilename` directory 参数指定的目录中的参数名称创建的文件包含已保存发现文档、XML 架构定义 (XSD) 架构和服务说明的映射。The file created with the name of the `topLevelFilename` parameter in the directory specified by the directory parameter contains a map of saved discovery documents, XML Schema Definition (XSD) schemas and service descriptions. 可以使用方法读取此文件 ，以填充 和 属性。This file can be read in using the method to populate the and properties. 文件的格式为 XML，其中包含类的序列化版本 。The format of the file is XML containing an serialized version of the class. 如果存在与参数中的参数同名的文件 `topLevelFilename` `directory` ，则方法将覆盖该文件 。If a file exists with the same name as the `topLevelFilename` parameter in the `directory` parameter, that file is overwritten by the method. `topLevelFilename`如果文件在当前目录中不存在，则该参数必须包含完全限定的路径。The `topLevelFilename` parameter must include the fully qualified path if the file does not exist in the current directory. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是一个 Web 窗体，该窗体在调用和后调用方法，将 Web 服务发现的结果写入磁盘 。The following code example is a Web Form that writes the results of a Web Services discovery to disk by invoking the method after calls to and . [!code-csharp[DiscoveryClientProtocol.WriteAll#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DiscoveryClientProtocol.WriteAll/CS/discocs.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[DiscoveryClientProtocol.WriteAll#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DiscoveryClientProtocol.WriteAll/VB/discovb.aspx#1)]
